mapper.sql: log_id, method_name, request_ip, request_url, request_date, response_time, request_user
mapper.insert: insert into system_log (log_id, method_name, request_ip, request_url, request_date, response_time, request_user, request_arguments, response_exception, response_result) values (#{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{responseTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requestUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestArguments,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{responseException,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{responseResult,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
